Reviews.Title: Yes and No........I guess its OK
Reviews.Author: Tahsin Oguz Acarturk
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for.Pros:The technology  is good. It takes good picyires with a lot of options. The movie is great.Cons:But it eats the battery like there is no tomorrow.I change battery every day. If you take a movie, even more.The flash is super slow.Smtms it has hard time focusing.The SD card and battery slot is in the same spot, so batteries fall out everytime you open the SD card (unlike the older versions)In the end its OK, gets the job done. The full package batteries, tripod, bag etc.....are good

Reviews.Title: Great gift option
Reviews.Author: Nana B.
Reviews.Content: This was a nice starter camera for someone that wants to take pictures faster and have a better picture as the end result.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: Melissa Grenier
Reviews.Content: love this new cam! would totally recommend this! takes great pictures, totally worth the price! Great package deal makes it worth it!

Reviews.Title: Great bundle for great price!.. the coolest thing is the camera.. amazing.!
Reviews.Author: Neeru
Reviews.Content: I just loved this camera.. and the bundle it comes in with..it is really nice with lots of features.. the combination of the pixel 16MP and 14X zoom is wonderful .. Picture quality is crisp and clear..has many picture settings which just makes it even more better..I got a broken tripod..( the tripod is flexible and small.. I liked that one..though)..and also I did not get the same camera case as it shows in the picture.. but the seller had apologized and I got a refund of $ 15 from them..Overall much interesting this is the camera and it works on AA batteries which makes it even more easy to go for outing and carry a bunch of batteries along with you.. and when they are down.. just replace with new ones!.. no headache of re-charging the battery ( you know the square or rectangular batteries which need plug points to re-charge... and when you are on and outing it will surely disappoint you to re-charge it).Enjoy clicking!..

Reviews.Title: My purchase
Reviews.Author: Deane Atwood
Reviews.Content: I picked this camera to take photos of my orchids in the greenhouse, it works fine for close ups.I love it and would recomend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: Works like a Nikon. Still has some shutter lag but for $150 you don't expect everything. Resolution is very good. Be as steady as possible when pressing the shutter button or you will notice some lack of sharpness in your pictures. On balance excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: jsjw
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect!  All of the accessories work perfectly! Great camera, I definitely recommend it! Easy to hold, and pretty lightwieght.

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Dark Grey) 16GB Super Bundleby Nikon
